title: Hour 2 - NBA Season Odds, Ben Volin
itunes:title: Hour 2 - NBA Season Odds, Ben Volin
description:
Dan previews the NBA season from a betting perspective. And he talks to NFL Insider Ben Volin about the fireworks between Dallas Cowboys Owner, Jerry Jones and New England Patriots Owner, Robert Kraft at the NFL owners meetings.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
